com.facebook.buck.core.parser.buildtargetpattern

Class BuildTargetPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.core.parser.buildtargetpattern.BuildTargetPattern
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImmutableBuildTargetPattern

    @Value.Immutable(builder=false,
                 copy=false,
                 prehash=true)
public abstract class BuildTargetPattern
extends Object
    Parsed representation of build target pattern

    Refer to BuildTargetPatternParser for acceptable pattern formats
